oracle text:
2/2
  Whenever Banana Wizard enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
  Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.
  "Peel back the mysteries of the banana, and you will find magic."
